nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Replenish I\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"Upon breaking crops, nether\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"wart, or cocoa, automatically\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"replant from materials in your\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"inventory.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Cocoa Beans Collection\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Axe\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Hoe\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"RARE\",\"color\":\"blue\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"REPLENISH;1","enchantments":"{replenish:1"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
